item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: ExpressRoute resiliency insights
item.description:
Azure has announced general availability of Resiliency Insights for ExpressRoute. This assessment capability measures network reliability for ExpressRoute workloads using a resiliency index â€” a percentage score calculated from factors such as route resilience (source content truncated).

  • Source: Azure Updates
